name: Spy Capture
description:
This game is a prototype that was created for our course's game a week semester project. The theme for this game was Mash Up.

This game was made in collaboration with CJ Katayas.  A local multiplayer capture the flag game with spies! This was a mash up of my previous game Mission Classified, and a food fight game that CJ created for one of our other game a week prompts.
